enhanced_description: Mercer is a global HR consulting and technology provider, part of Marsh McLennan, with over 25,000 employees operating in 130+ countries. For over 75 years, Mercer has provided trusted advice and solutions to help organizations redefine work, reshape retirement, and enhance health and well-being. Their expertise spans global investments (including OCIO services for financial goals), talent and transformation (covering workforce and HR strategy, organization design, strategic workforce planning, change management, and HR digital strategy), and customized global benefits management programs. Mercer offers comprehensive solutions across Recruiting, Total Rewards (including benefits administration, compensation management, employee recognition, and sales compensation software), and Talent Management (encompassing performance, career, and broader talent management software and solutions). The company is committed to building a more diverse and inclusive workforce, demonstrated by 55% female representation globally, and aims for 50% reduced portfolio emissions by 2030, reflecting a commitment to sustainability.
